description: Marin`s adopted grandmother who takes care of her at their tenement house. She and her husband found marin abandoned on their doorstep and they decide to take care of her for that time they had just recently lost there son in the war. She is very strong and independent woman and cares about marin very much and will do anything to protect her. She also very wise and gives good advice to people. She dies of Episode 10, The Giant Monster`s Brilliance.
name: Asagi Moto
